result.title: Dissemination and communication activity v1
result.description: This report will provide evidences on dissemination and exploitation actions conducted by the consortium as a whole and per single participant. A specific section will be dedicated to open information management activity. Finally performances indicators (see Section 2.2) related to dissemination and exploitation will be reported and commented. Together with the report will be provided all the dissemination and communication material that will be produced by the consortium (webinars, videos, etc.)

result.title: Final Specification of Multi-Cloud Mechanisms for Knowledge Acquisition, Service Provision, Security and Privacy
result.description: This deliverable will present the final specification of multicloud mechanisms for knowledge acquisition service provision security and privacy in the project It will detail the approaches towards service representation decomposition and migration the supporting mechanisms of knowledge derivation about smart objects and platform capabilities and status as well as the security and trust mechanisms for preventing unauthorized access to data compromises due to malicious or misbehaving smart objects and for assessing humanlevel relationships

result.description: This deliverable includes a description of the techniques used for the analysis of (1) multi-modal feedback (T2.3), (2) user sessions and profiles (T2.4), and (3) user feedback together with context information (T2.5). result.title: Initial Specification of Multi-Cloud Mechanisms for Knowledge Acquisition, Service Provision, Security and Privacy
result.description: This deliverable will present the initial specification of multicloud mechanisms for knowledge acquisition service provision security and privacy in the project It will describe the approaches towards service representation decomposition and migration the supporting mechanisms of knowledge derivation about smart objects and platform capabilities and status as well as the security and trust mechanisms for preventing unauthorized access to data compromises due to malicious or misbehaving smart objects and for assessing humanlevel relationships

result.title: Solutions for Non-functional Aspects of Cloud Applications
result.description: This deliverable will describe the extensions required in the SDL-NG framework and other components to take into account non-functional aspects of cloud applications, as well as the solutions for (optimal) nonfunctional selection of clouds. It will also outline the proposed solutions and the information required to implement those solutions.
